# MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.min

**Case**

The GPU compares all depth samples in the pixel and selects the sample with the smallest value.

## Declaration

```swift
case min
```

## Depth resolve filters

- **MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.sample0**: No filter is applied.
- **MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.max**: The GPU compares all depth samples in the pixel and selects the sample with the largest value.
